title: 83/457/EEC: Commission Decision of 1 September 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Varian - NMR Spectrometer System, model EM-360L' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 1 September 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Varian - NMR Spectrometer System, model EM-360L' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/457/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Varian - NMR Spectrometer System, model EM-360L', which is the subject of an application by France of 28 February 1983, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
